BR_text.BRsummary: Remove references to blas and lapack
BR_text.BRdescription:
Now that we have replaced Armadillo with Eigen, we can remove the dependencies on libblas and libpack. We still mention these dependencies in:
 <denchmark-code>BUILD.md
 INSTALL_ISSUES.md
 LINUX_INSTALL.md
 </denchmark-code>
 
 And we still check for LAPACK in CMakeLists.txt:
 <denchmark-code>CMakeLists.txt:  include(FindLAPACK)
 CMakeLists.txt:  if(NOT ${LAPACK_FOUND})
 CMakeLists.txt:    message(FATAL_ERROR "lapack is not installed")
 </denchmark-code>
 
 And we still install it in Travis CI:
 <denchmark-code>.travis.yml:      - liblapack-dev
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text: We can probably also remove -DARMA_NO_DEBUG, right?
